title: Sylvia Park Hoyts show bag skin?

embed.description: The tournament will feature three game modes: Summoners Rift 5v5, played between each Wildcard All-Star team A 1v1 tournament played between all 35 starting players A Player Voted Game Mode between the three Asia-based regions (Japan, Oceania and Southeast Asia), the two European regions (CIS and Turkey), and the two Latin American regions (Brazil and LATAM).

body:
My show bag arrived in the mail today due to them not having them at the event and I was just wondering if the bag was supposed to come with a mystery skin because that's what it says on the promo. 
Thanks.

replies.body: Just out of curiousity, what 2 skins exactly were people meant to recieve? I heard Champ Thresh was one of em.
Not sure, I think it's a mystery skin.
